titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2,4-Dichlorophenoxyacetic acid, its salts and esters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Amends the harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2003, the duty on 2,4-Dichlorophenoxyacetic acid, its salts and esters.
